item.description:
Event: Get a head start on that New Year's resolution for more exercise, join us for a chance to have fun while working at staying in shape. We will begin the day with yoga to stretch out before a run of your choice of either 20, 40 or 60 minutes.

Events Leaders: Steve and Stu

Meet:  Meet at 9am in the lot adjacent to Hebrew Rehab at corner of Centre Street & Walter Street at Arnold Arboretum, 125 Arborway in Jamaica Plain,    

Rsvp: For more details on exactly where and how to connect with Steve and Stu.

Cost: There is a $5 charge for Meetups participants which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements for meeting

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Go for some Yoga and a Run at Arnold Arboretum
